The Destroyer And The Savior:Prologue
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Completed Epics Section III: The Destroyer And The Savior:Prologue
By BlackSoulSlicer on Sunday, December 7, 2003 - 05:51 pm:

Hi!I'm BlackSoulSlicer and I'm gonna be creating 3 Chapters for this story.This is the Prologue....

We all know that when monsters are young they are very playful and a bit bad...well this monster is different...very different.......
In the far far lands of Vagalon(which are east of the island of Ryuwn) there is a small cave found in the city streets of Vega,a small town.In that cave lies something far more mysterious and far more dangerous than any monster.Many breeders have to tame it or capture or even kill it but none could do it......none until the day the chosen monster was born......he was a Garu.The chosen monster was a Garu!Who do you ask the Garu belongs to?The Chosen One,X....X is a young 14-year old breeder.He's a dropout of Elives School but he soon got a signed and legal breeder license.After that he became the Togle Champion and soon enough the Ryuwn Champ as well!He was unstoppable.......but that was about to end.............................

Prologue End
To be continued...................
